Our brown leather toiletry bag is your first and last choice when purchasing for yourself or your loved one. Because what you see in our images is what you get!

👑 Say No More to out-dated and awkward shaped shaving bags! We have tried, tested and chosen a premium shape and design for this dopp kit, it is strong, dureable and easy to clean so this means it will always keep you looking fresh & professional no matter what you spill on it. The internal is made of a waterproof lining, so no worries when carrying liquids or shaving cream. just wipe, wash and your men’s toiletry case is ready to roll once again.

👑 Always Running Out of Space? - With its two spacious compartments, multiple pockets & zippers, our leather toiletry bag is perfect for all your needs. Whether that is as a simple shaving kit bag, travel toiletry bag, men’s toiletry bag or dopp kit. This leather grooming bag will be the last one you ever buy. The everyday accessory for all the modern-day man’s accessories. Size 9.75"x5"x5"

👑 “Quality is Never an Accident; It is a Result of Skillfull Execution” – Our life goal is to create quality products for the modern-man. with only quality materials and craftsmanship accepted, you know this is the perfect gift for you son, father, grandfather or that special man in your life. Put a smile on his dial when he unwraps our make life exclusive leather toiletry bag.

✔️ Make Life Exclusive Guarntee? – We know our competitors’ products have let you down before, because we can see their reviews! … but we won’t! We know you are going to love this toiletry bag that much that we are locking you in for a 1 FULL YEAR WARRANTY from purchase. If anything goes wrong, let us know and we will make you smile again. Purchase with ease of mind that you are getting a quality men’s travel & toiletry bag with the make life exclusive guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Perfect Addition To Your Essentials. _________ For Holidays. For Business. Any journey you take as a Modern Man. In addition you want to take care of yourself. Keep it organized and keep it classy. The only choice is our MLE Toiletry Bag that fits everything you need without compromising. .

Be you no matter what. _________ Trustworthy. Exclusive. But most importantly designed with care. Here at MLE we want to provide you self-care essentials that we would like to purchase ourselves. We also understand the importance or individuality in today's world. Be you no matter what. .

No Cutting Costs - Ever. The way we manufacture our products knows no shortcuts. We look into details, we monitor our resources and try to better our company every day. You are safe with us! The Search For The Next Perfect Gift Is Over. How many times have we all struggled with looking for that perfect gift that is going to be loved by the receiver? Our Toiletry Bag is a perfect gift for somebody you care for. Or just for yourself. Or why not both? Organized By All Means. Let your Toiletry Bag help you to be how you are everyday - neat, elegant and organized. Organization shows that you are in control. And MLE wants you to always be in control. Start with the small things, aim at the big ones.

Ready When You Are. On The Go. _________ Business appointment across the country? Long day at the office filled with meetings? Beach vacations ahead? The MLE Toiletry Bag will help you keep it fresh, stylish and neat. Anywhere you choose to go. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great case! Perfect size! Good quality! Love the shape for packing.I am very satisfied and I highly recommend !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good travel bag
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace a military shaving bag my husband has that has seen better days. This bag (because of the zipped compartment on the bottom) is not as deep as the original. I can see where this would be great for traveling and using smaller 3 oz items but the top compartment cannot hold all of the things he can currently hold in the military shaving bag. The leather quality is sufficient but not as thick and sturdy as the military bag. I would recommend for travel but for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this shaving kit as a gift and the recipient has been very happy with it. It is durable, wipes off or washes well. Has a fairly large content capacity and is easy to pack and carry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the quality, size, and layout. ❤️
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husband as a surprise gift for his upcoming work trip. It’s such good quality! It’s very stylish and masculine, and I Iove ❤️ the card saying you’re part of their Make Life Exclusive family. Makes my hubby feel like he’s got fancy stuff, on our budget!The bag can hold standard size shampoos and bottles, so we didn’t need to shrink down his hair gel or sun block bottles which I always find hard to find small versions of.The bottom section has easy access and holders for smaller stuff like nail clippers and combs so he won’t when to rummage around.The square design is great for packing too and fits easily into hubby’s carry on bag for the flight ✈️. All in all a great back with quality workmanship, ethical leathers, and seems like a great company to buy from. Get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well made. Carries all you need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my fiancé and he appreciates the quality of this bag for his personal items. It’s roomy, nice looking leather and there’s a storage space at the bottom with a zippered closure. We would definitely recommend this kit.
